channel.title: Website please loooook
channel.description:
im very new to this kind of stuff please help....
i am wanting to make a website where i can put my server downlload link on...plus i want it to have a chatbox if you can help me please add me on msn calfool96@hotmail.com

item.title: Website please loooook
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you’re on windows, get WAMP/XAMPP, Mac MAMP, Linux LAMP, lookup the install instructions on google, then download the SMF 2.0/1.1 files, and transfer them to the webserver. You can also host cheap websites for about %10 a month at http://www.hosting24.com/

Read full topic

item.title: Website please loooook
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“calfool96, post:1, topic:335802”]im very new to this kind of stuff please help…

i am wanting to make a website where i can put my server downlload link on…plus i want it to have a chatbox if you can help me please add me on msn calfool96@hotmail.com[/quote]

Check out the SMF forums. Their free, and are lightweight. You can also add an AJAZX chatbox to it. Or if you want the easy way, check out something along the lines of Forumotion.
